item.title: Taiwan's president pledges to defend island's sovereignty after Chinese military drills
item.description: Taiwanese President Lai Ching-te vowed to defend the self-ruled island's sovereignty in the face of what he termed China's "expansionist ambitions," days after Beijing wrapped up live-fire military drills near its shores.

item.title: Mobile crisis teams shut down amid funding troubles
item.description: In recent years, mobile crisis response teams respond to 911 calls about people in mental crisis, to avoid involving police. But some crisis units have now closed for lack of consistent funding.

item.title: About 40 people are dead and 115 hurt in a fire at Swiss bar's New Year's celebration
